subject: New Microsoft CSF Series Assembly Competition: $4,500 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

Microsoft invites you to join in the latest Connected Services Framework (CSF) competition, and help build a Web-based tool for the Microsoft Connected Services Framework Session Management component. 

The challenge is to write a Web-based tool -- preferably using Silverlight (http://www.microsoft.com/silverlight/) -- that can connect to a CSF Session Manager Web Service, obtain a list of sessions that already exist, and perform a variety of other tasks.

The prizes for this competition are: 
* First prize - $3,000
* Second prize - $1,000
* Third prize - $500

Learn more and register here: http://csf.topcoder.com/?module=Static&d1=assembly&d2=msSessionManifestDetails

Best of luck to you in the CSF Competition Series! 

- The TopCoder Competitions Team 

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder software development opportunities and/or TopCoder Studio competitions.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, log in to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
